text:
It would be quite useful to extend the <input> task to have a boolean field to
indicate that it's a password.  If one is entering input and the password field
is true, then either nothing would be exhoed, or '*' characters would be echoed.

This would make it better for me to manually enter passwords to my FTP site when
I run an ant task that uploads a batch of files for me.  At the moment, I have
to check that no one is looking first when I enter my password.
